Email 2.subject: RE: Request - Matpers FG 505 (Gefrax OP 10) - Drums/Totes - Re-Approval - PA25-291/292 - Matangi

body.text:
Dear Tracy,

Greetings of the day!

We have received your email and are currently working on it. We will share the details with you once completed.

Thank you for your patience.

Email 3.subject: Request - Matpers FG 505 (Gefrax OP 10) - Drums/Totes - Re-Approval - PA25-291/292 - Matangi

body.text:
Hi Mahek,

We are in the process of renewing / updating our documents that are on file since 2021 for this material.  A lot has changed since 2021 on our end and now require additional documentation for this material.  We will also be sending you updated package approval instructions and labels for both pack sizes.

Attachments

  *   PAIR Form - please complete and forward all requested documents/information.
  *   Supplier Contact Info Form  - Complete all sections
  *   Product Safety Regulatory Form - Complete/Sign/Date/Return
  *   Supplier Change Notification Requirements - Sign/Date/Return
  *   Country of Origin Statement on Supplier's Letterhead (example attached) - please put this on your company letterhead.
